title: Gardening & Permaculture Books In My Library #permaculture #permaculturebooks #gardeningbooks

subtasks: Identifying permaculture book series (Permaculture One, Two, Introduction)
Recommending Soil Food for soil improvement
Suggesting natural farming resources (e.g., books by Pat Colby)
Highlighting local and area-specific gardening knowledge (weeds, foraging)
Recommending essential permaculture design books (Earth User's Guide, Designer's Manual)
Advising on practical kitchen garden guides (Stephanie Alexander's books, Jamie Oliver, Matthew Evans)
Suggesting resources for preserving and cooking vegetables (e.g., charcuterie)
Providing references for technical horticulture and seed saving
